|stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 patch 18; |tp_firmware=Debian, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui_eth=FC:F5:28 }} {{TagLine|NSA320 2-Bay Media Server}} *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/zyxel-nsa320 ''ZyXEL NSA320'' on '''archlinux|ARM'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/32359-zyxel-nsa320-2-bay-power-media-server-reviewed ''ZyXEL NSA320 2-Bay Power Media Server'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 @1.2GHz *RAM: 512MB DDR2 DRAM *Storage: 128MB NAND flash, 2x SATA II *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 3x USB 2.0 *Power Source: DC Jack 19V ==Images== File:NSA320 Top.jpeg|Top of board File:NSA320 bottom.jpeg|Bottom of board [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
